name: The squirrel hero
description:
Well. You know the story is that there are squirrels lost in space. You are the brave squirrel-bowl-pilot. You even have a helmet! You want to save as many squirrels as possible and put them back to trees. The trees will then take them to the squirrel homeland where they will again do the squirrel business: jump between the trees, hide nuts, plan the world domination.

Don't speed! Your bowl is rather fragile. And beware the evil wasps

Controls

Use WAD to control the ship. By the way, it has no breaks.
